title: English Premier League sets revenue record with income of £6 . 1bn , new figures reveal
body_text:
English Premier League sets revenue record with income of £6.1bn, new figures reveal
The English Premier League dominated European football leagues once again, the 33rd Annual Review of Football Finance by Deloitte Sports Business Group showed today (June 25), with the English top flight registering record-breaking aggregate revenue of £6.1bn, up 11% on the previous year (£5.5bn).
Revenue across the European football market in total grew by 16% to €35.3bn in the 2022/23 season (€30.4bn in 2021/22), which played host to the winter 2022 FIFA World Cup and was also the first since 2018/19 unaffected by COVID-19 ...
